AuthBase.oidcGenericExplanation: Kolibri ndi malo ophunzirira a pa intaneti. Mukhonzanso kugwiritsa ntchito akaunti ya Kolibri kuti mulowe mma pulogalamu ena.
AuthBase.oidcSpecificExplanation: Mwatumizidwa kuno kuchokera ku '{app_name}'. Kolibri ndi malo ophunzirira a pa intaneti, ndipo mukhonzanso kugwiritsa ntchito akaunti ya Kolibri kuti mulowe ku '{app_name}'.
AuthBase.restrictedAccess: Simungathe kulowa pa Kolibri pogwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zina
AuthBase.restrictedAccessDescription: Kuti musinthe zimenezi, lowani ndi akaunti ya supa admini ndipo musinthe zokhudza netiweki ya chipangizochi
DeviceUnusableStrings.deprovisioningErro: Papezeka vuto poyesa kuyika Kolibri. Chonde yesaninso.
DeviceUnusableStrings.noSuperuserCallToA: Chonde ikaninso Kolibri kuti mupange akaunti ya ogwiritsa ntchito wamkulu.
DeviceUnusableStrings.noSuperusersNotice: Chipangizochi nchosatheka kugwiritsa ntchito chifukwa mulibe ma akaunti a wogwiritsa ntchito wamkulu.
DeviceUnusableStrings.superusersSoftDele: Chonde funsani woyang'anira kuti abwenzeretse akaunti yanu kapena ayikenso Kolibri kuti mupange akaunti yatsopano ya ogwiritsa ntchito wamkulu.
Chipangizochi ndi chosatheka kugwiritsa ntchito chifukwa ma akaunti onse a wogwiritsa ntchito wamkulu pa chipangizochi achotsedwa pa seva.
DeviceUnusableStrings.unknownIssueNotice: Chipangizochi ndi chosatheka kugwiritsa ntchito pa chifukwa chosadziwika. Chonde dziwitsani oyang'anira.
FacilitySelect.askAdminForAccountLabel: Pemphani adimini kuti akutsekulireni akaunti ya malo awa:
FacilitySelect.canSignUpForFacilityLabel: Sankhani malo amene mukufuna kuti azilumikizana ndi akaunti yanu yatsopano:
FacilitySelect.selectFacilityLabel: Sankhani malo amene ali ndi akaunti yanu
GenderSelect.placeholder: Sankhani ngati muli mkazi kapena mwamuna
NewPasswordPage.needToMakeNewPasswordLab: Takulandirani, {user}. Mukuyenera kupanga nambala yachinsinsi yatsopano ya akaunti yanu.
SignInPage.requiredForCoachesAdmins: Pasiwedi ya makochi ndi ma adimini ikufunika
SignUpPage.demographicInfoExplanation: Uthengawu uziwonedwa ndi anthu oyendetsa ntchito za tsambali. Uzigwiritsidwanso ntchito pokonza pologalamu ndi zipangizo kuti zigwirizane ndi zofuna za ophunzira.
SignUpPage.privacyLinkText: Dziwani zambiri za kagwiritsidwe ntchito ndi chinsinsi
TaskStrings.importSuccessStatus: Malo ophunzirira a '{facilityName}' atheka kulowetsedwa m'chipangizochi
TaskStrings.taskLODFinishedByLabel: Akaunti '{fullname}' kuchokera ku '{facilityname}' yatheka kulowa m'chipangizochi
UserPageSnackbars.signedOut: Munachotsedwapo chifukwa munakhala musakugwiritsa ntchito kwa nthawi yaitali
